resources.string: Your rewiring journey ended after %1$d fills on %2$s. Next time you will make it longer!

string-array.name: ranks
string-array.item: Initiate – Just getting started; shows potential.
Apprentice – Learning and growing; dedicated effort.
Champion – Stands out among peers; achieves notable success.
Master – Commands respect through refined skill.
Sage – Wise and insightful; often a guide to others.
Deity – Elevated beyond human limits; inspires awe.
